caption.p: The list of plant taxa used against influenza in Turkish folk medicine.

Eaten raw or dried, Cataplasm (with tarhana flour), Molasses

fn.p: W: Wild plans, C: Cultured plants, WC: Wild and cultured plants, E: Endemic plants.
Boldly highlighted taxa (which are 189 in total and their anti-influenza effects have not been investigated experimentally yet).

fn.label: a
fn.p: The plants that were also identified to be used in the treatment of malaria.
